title: Profile Card
description: Create a function that generates a formatted profile card string from a name, age, and hobby.
instructions: Write a function profileCard(name: String, age: Int, hobby: String) that returns a multi-line string with the format shown in the expected output. Print the result for ('Alice', 25, 'coding').

hints.text: Use string templates with $variable for interpolation
Use println for each line or a multi-line string
Each line follows the pattern 'Label: value'

commonMistakes.consequence: Prints literal $name instead of the value
